com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter

Class GPUImageBoxBlurFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImageFilter
      • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImageFilterGroup
        • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImageTwoPassFilter

            • com.temp.cam.camerasdk.library.filter.GPUImageBoxBlurFilter

  • public class GPUImageBoxBlurFilter
extends GPUImageTwoPassTextureSamplingFilter
    A hardware-accelerated 9-hit box blur of an image

    scaling: for the size of the applied blur, default of 1.0
